work.desc_title: Joseph the Hymnographer, Kanon on Saints and Martyrs

note.value: The folio probably belonged to a Menaion manuscript

Bibliography: Abbreviation of the edition, MR V = Μηναῖα τοῦ ὅλου ἐνιαουτοῦ, V,  Ἐν Ῥώμῃ 1889 ; G. Rossetto, Greek Palimpsests at Saint Catherine's Monastery (Sinai): Three Euchologia as Case Studies, Vienna 2022
